Public MustInherit Class BuildEventArgs Inherits EventArgs
public ref class BuildEventArgs abstract : EventArgs

span.span: Provides data for the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类是所有的抽象基类事件自变量类。The class is an abstract base class for all event argument classes. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何编写基本记录器对应生成事件。The following example shows how to write a basic logger that responds to build events. [!code-csharp[msbuild_BasicLogger#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Misc/msbuild_BasicLogger/CS/msbuild_BasicLogger.cs#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置位置上下文信息。

span.span: Gets or sets location contextual information.

summary.span: 这连接到记录事件以定义其相对于正在执行的进程、引擎、项目、目标或任务的位置。

span.span: This is attached to logging events to define where they are located in relation to the process, engine, project, target, or task that is executing.

value.span: 一个 对象，表示位置上下文信息。

span.span: A object representing the location contextual information.
